name: Space Crush4rs
description:
Space Crush4rs is a "sequel" to the game Space Crush3rs.

In this game you are a spaceship that got stuck in the middle of space, surrounded by an Infinite amount of enemies Including some big bosses. Currently, the game is not finished but there's a demo free to play.

Controls:
Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Credits:
John Dorian - Music.
Turtl33 -Programming, Art.
Dogtagyou - Programming, sound effects.
